title: Great support!

author: Xander Warrender
comment: Is this a joke?  A pie chart to tell me my day?  Crashed my watch as soon as it loaded, and expects me to add custom pics to every event in my calendar.... (and app crashes as soon as I picked a pic) What a waste.  Pure garbage.

reply.author: Calypsoft
reply.content:
Hi Xander,
You can choose a default background or a background for long events (holidays etc). You don't need to customize each event.
I am really sorry that the mobile app crashed. It is due to a missing special permission to read photos on the SD card. We just have delivered a fix thanks to you.
About your watch issue could you tell us more ?

title: Worst app for my watch I've seen

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: I really like the concept but the resolution of the pictures was terrible.

reply.author: Calypsoft
reply.content:
Hi Elizabeth, thank you for your feedback. Pictures are downscaled if necessary to fit your watch screen resolution.
SmartFace is tested on different screen resolutions: moto 360, gwatch, gear live. Could you try to pick your pictures with a different image gallery?
Otherwise please contact me on http://en.smartface.watch/contact-us/ ?
